rows.label: qst201309_msg0001
rows.name:
Is everyone here? If I may, I'd
like to share my findings
concerning the missing children.

rows.label: qst201309_msg0002
rows.name:
It sounds like you've happened across
something interesting, Tokiha.

rows.label: qst201309_msg0004
rows.name:
Apparently a similar incident
has been taking place here
in Fons Maim as well.

rows.label: qst201309_msg0005
rows.name:
A number of children have
been reported missing.

rows.label: qst201309_msg0006
rows.name:
I can't help but think
this must be related to
the Avaritia case somehow.

rows.label: qst201309_msg0010
rows.name: I don't like the sound of all this...

rows.label: qst201309_msg0007
rows.name:
Nor do I. This may be a more
insidious case than we expected.

rows.label: qst201309_msg0008
rows.name:
There's an informant in this city
by the name of Darryth. We should
see what he has to offer first.
